root.name: Looney Tunes Collector: Alert!
root.description: OverviewLooney Tunes Collector alert is a Looney Tunes based platform game for the Game Boy Color. It was marketed bizarrely as a game similar to Pokemon with over 40 characters to collect. In reality this is far from the truth, it is merely an action game with collectibles that happen to be other Looney Tunes characters.
